response.overview: Join the Little Historians, it’s time for another adventure in our fascinating past! Let’s get ready for a new journey to learn all about the history of the Declaration of Independence. As usual, that mischievous scoundrel Napoleon Bonaparte is trying to thwart Little Abe Lincoln and Little Georgie Washington’s learning adventure by rewriting history! Quick! Into the portal! It's time to go back in time to find the facts! Let the adventure begin with Little Historians: Declaration of Independence!
response.title: Little Historians: Declaration of Independence
